chapters.title: Chapter 44: HuntedChapter 45: Caemlyn
chapters.info: Basel Gill, p. 522 (419)—Innkeeper of the Queen's Blessing, an inn in Caemlyn. Rand and Mat stayed there on their way through Caemlyn (before the battle at the Eye of the World), and Thom and Mat stay there when Mat is in Caemlyn to deliver Elayne's letter.
